snippet: The center fielder Andres Torres was injured in the season opener on Thursday. To replace him, the Mets will recall Kirk Nieuwenhuis from the minors.
abstract: The center fielder Andres Torres was injured in the season opener on Thursday. To replace him, the Mets will recall Kirk Nieuwenhuis from the minors.

headline.main: Strained Calf Sends Mets' Torres to Disabled List
